sentences.english: The reason why the white-collars suffer increasing work-related stress is that they pursue work achievement in career.

sentences.english: Now the Tianjin people live the pressure high, particularly white-collar race.

sentences.english: Leo: You should learn from those female white-collar workers to wear radiation protection mask.

sentences.english: The newbilization of white collar is a global trend.

sentences.english: Suzie, do you prefer the shirt with the white collar Or the one with the blue collar?
sentences.chinese: 蘇西，你更喜歡那件白領的襯衣還是那件藍領的呢？

sentences.english: When the telephone rings, some new OLs or OGs ( Office Ladies or gentlemen) will get upset.

sentences.english: They are now at such a high level that even white-collar workers cannot afford to buy apartments anymore.

sentences.english: Gradually his capacious chin encroached upon the borders of the white cravat.

sentences.english: We are the auto portal with focus on 100 million elite Chinese consumers, the middle class.

sentences.english: Ling said female students really don't have much choice if they want to secure employment in the competitive white-collar job market.
